title: 2BD/2BA Roma Style Apartment Home Bellevue Down Town Area
posting_body: We have a spacious 2BD/2BA Roma style Apartment Home available for Oct 1st  move in.

This lovely 1253 sqft Apartment Home features two master suites on opposite sides of the apartment, yard access, wood flooring throughout the unit, reserved parking space in the controlled assess garage, full size washer/dryer in unit, air conditioning, gas fireplace and a lot more...
ft. Apartment Home is available for Oct 1st ,  renting at $3200 per month with long term lease.
Milano is a pet friendly community with no monthly pet rent.
Milano is a exclusive high end community located on NE 8th Street of Downtown Bellevue area.
Our community amenities include a fitness center, conference room and state of the art Starbucks coffee machine with 24/7 complementary coffee.
